events.title: 3rd Anniversary Celebration
events.description: The Vesos Ambassadors Club is preparing to celebrate its third anniversary, marking three years of dedication, growth, and student engagement.
events.descriptionFr: Le Club des Ambassadeurs Vesos se prépare à célébrer son troisième anniversaire, marquant trois années de dévouement, de croissance et d'engagement étudiant.
events.descriptionAr: يستعد نادي سفراء فيزوس للاحتفال بذكرى تأسيسه الثالثة، احتفاءً بثلاث سنوات من الالتزام والنمو ومشاركة الطلبة.
events.details: The event promises a warm celebration that highlights the club's journey and achievements so far. Surprises and special moments are planned to make this anniversary memorable for members, guests, and partners. More details will be revealed as the date approaches.

events.title: Pinky Night - October Awareness Event
events.titleFr: Soirée Rose - Événement de Sensibilisation d'Octobre
events.titleAr: أمسية الوردي - فعالية توعية لشهر أكتوبر
events.description: A collaborative Pink October event was held with Club Ambassadeurs Vesos ESSTSS and LPSES, combining awareness, fun, and community engagement.
events.descriptionFr: Un événement Pink October collaboratif a été organisé avec le Club Ambassadeurs Vesos ESSTSS et LPSES, alliant sensibilisation, convivialité et engagement communautaire.
events.descriptionAr: أقيمت فعالية مشتركة لشهر أكتوبر الوردي بالتعاون مع نادي سفراء فيزوس ESSTSS وLPSES، جمعت بين التوعية والأنشطة الترفيهية والمشاركة المجتمعية.
events.details: The evening featured a variety of activities designed to promote October's awareness message in a warm and engaging way. Participants enjoyed bracelet-making workshops, playful activities, and a supportive "dépistage" moment dedicated to girls' health awareness within a safe environment. The night ended with a cozy screening of Paddington 2, creating a memorable and meaningful experience for all attendees. The event blended education, creativity, and entertainment while strengthening bonds between the collaborating clubs.

events.title: Join & Connect - Season Opener
events.description: "Join & Connect" marked the opening of the 2025-2026 season, inviting students to discover the club, participate in activities, and get a feel for its atmosphere.
events.descriptionFr: "Rejoins & Connecte" a marqué l'ouverture de la saison 2025-2026, invitant les étudiants à découvrir le club, participer aux activités et ressentir son ambiance.
events.descriptionAr: شكّل "انضم وتواصل" افتتاح موسم 2025-2026، حيث دُعي الطلاب للتعرف على النادي والمشاركة في الأنشطة واختبار أجوائه.
events.details: Similar in spirit to previous integration and team-building events, this stand aimed to create a friendly and welcoming first contact with new students. The team organized small games, interactive activities, and open conversations to help visitors feel comfortable and learn about the club's mission and plans for the new year. The event helped set a positive tone for the upcoming season and encouraged new members to join the Vesos Ambassadors community.

events.title: Season Launch & Integration Day
events.titleFr: Lancement de Saison et Journée d'Intégration
events.description: The new academic season kicked off with the club's stand and integration day, welcoming new students and presenting the Vesos Ambassadors Club.
events.descriptionFr: La nouvelle saison académique a démarré avec le stand du club et sa journée d'intégration, accueillant les nouveaux étudiants et présentant le Vesos Ambassadors Club.
events.descriptionAr: انطلق الموسم الجامعي الجديد بجناح النادي ويوم الاندماج، حيث استُقبل الطلبة الجدد وتم التعريف بنادي سفراء فيزوس.
events.details: The team set up a booth to present the club's vision, answer questions, and invite students to join for the 2024-2025 season. The day focused on creating first connections, sharing plans for the year, and welcoming newcomers into the community.

events.title: Team Building Day
events.description: A team-building gathering brought new members together to meet the bureau, strengthen communication, and start collaborating smoothly.
events.descriptionFr: Une journée de team building a rassemblé les nouveaux membres pour rencontrer le bureau, renforcer la communication et démarrer une collaboration efficace.
events.descriptionAr: جمع يوم بناء الفريق الأعضاء الجدد للتعرف على المكتب وتعزيز التواصل والشروع في العمل المشترك بسلاسة.
events.details: Members met in a relaxed setting to connect, share experiences, and build trust for the projects ahead. Activities focused on teamwork, communication, and creating a friendly space for collaboration through the rest of the season.

events.title: 2nd Anniversary Celebration
events.description: The Vesos Ambassadors Club celebrated its second anniversary, marking two years of growth, activity, and community engagement.
events.descriptionFr: Le Club des Ambassadeurs Vesos a célébré son deuxième anniversaire, marquant deux années de croissance, d'activité et d'engagement communautaire.
events.descriptionAr: احتفل نادي سفراء فيزوس بذكرى تأسيسه الثانية، مؤكداً عامين من التطور والنشاط والمشاركة المجتمعية.
events.details: Members, partners, and supporters gathered to celebrate the club's milestones and reflect on the achievements of the past year. The event brought together familiar faces from the SOS community and created a warm atmosphere filled with appreciation and motivation for future progress.

events.title: Web Development Training
events.description: A practical training session was organized for students interested in web development, offering an introduction to essential front-end concepts.
events.descriptionFr: Une séance de formation pratique a été organisée pour les étudiants intéressés par le développement web, offrant une introduction aux notions essentielles du front-end.
events.descriptionAr: نُظمت حصة تدريبية عملية للطلبة المهتمين بتطوير الويب، وقدمت مقدمة لأهم مفاهيم الواجهة الأمامية.
events.details: Led by the talented trainer Rahma Hamza, the session introduced participants to the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Students learned how to structure web pages, style interfaces, and interact with elements through code. The training combined clear explanations with hands-on practice so attendees could experiment and build simple web components.

events.title: Play for Change - Game Learning Pitch Competition
events.titleFr: Play for Change - Compétition de Pitch d'Apprentissage par le Jeu
events.titleAr: Play for Change - مسابقة عروض التعلّم باللعب
events.description: "Play for Change" was an educational and creative competition inviting young participants to pitch game-based learning ideas that inspire positive development.
events.descriptionFr: "Play for Change" était une compétition éducative et créative invitant de jeunes participants à présenter des idées d'apprentissage basées sur le jeu pour stimuler un développement positif.
events.descriptionAr: كانت "Play for Change" مسابقة تعليمية وإبداعية دعت الشباب لعرض أفكار تعلّم قائمة على اللعب تلهم التطور الإيجابي.
events.location: ISIMS, Sfax / Maison des Jeunes Sakiet Ezzit
events.locationFr: ISIMS, Sfax / Maison des Jeunes Sakiet Ezzit
events.locationAr: ISIMS، صفاقس / دار الشباب ساقية الزيت
events.details: Organized in collaboration with Game Zone Club (ISIMS), the event encouraged children and youth to explore the intersection of gaming and learning. Participants presented innovative concepts that used interactive gameplay as a tool for skill-building, education, and personal growth. Across two days, the event included pitching sessions, playful activities, and guidance from mentors, creating a motivating environment for creativity and learning.

events.title: Movie-Making Boot Camp
events.titleFr: Boot Camp de Réalisation de Films
events.description: A filmmaking boot camp was held to introduce participants to the fundamentals of movie creation, from ideas to final cuts.
events.descriptionFr: Un boot camp de réalisation de films a été organisé pour initier les participants aux principes fondamentaux de la création cinématographique, des idées aux montages finaux.
events.descriptionAr: أقيم معسكر مكثف لصناعة الأفلام لتعريف المشاركين بأساسيات إنتاج الفيلم، من الفكرة حتى المونتاج النهائي.
events.details: Inspired by the official announcement theme, the boot camp guided students through the entire filmmaking process: scripting, storyboarding, directing, filming, and editing. With practical tasks and supportive guidance, attendees experimented with storytelling and visual expression. The event aimed to help aspiring filmmakers discover new skills, unleash creativity, and produce their first short film in a collaborative environment.

events.title: Mental Health Awareness Day
events.titleFr: Journée de Sensibilisation à la Santé Mentale
events.description: A mental-health-focused awareness day was organized in collaboration with Club Ambassadeurs SOS ISIMS and Club Ambassadeurs SOS LPSES, bringing students together for an open and supportive discussion.
events.descriptionFr: Une journée de sensibilisation dédiée à la santé mentale a été organisée en collaboration avec le Club Ambassadeurs SOS ISIMS et le Club Ambassadeurs SOS LPSES, réunissant les étudiants pour un échange ouvert et bienveillant.
events.descriptionAr: نُظم يوم توعوي بالصحة النفسية بالتعاون مع نادي سفراء SOS ISIMS ونادي سفراء SOS LPSES، جمع الطلبة لحوار مفتوح وداعم.
events.details: The event featured practicing psychologists, personal testimonies, and accessible guidance to help participants better understand mental health challenges. Attendees engaged in meaningful conversations about well-being, emotional resilience, and seeking support when needed. After the discussion panel, a relaxed “post-café” gathering offered space for reflection, connection, and informal conversation, helping create a warm community atmosphere around an important topic.

events.title: Season Launch & Integration Day
events.titleFr: Lancement de la Saison et Journée d'Intégration
events.description: The club kicked off the new academic season with its first stand at ISIMS, welcoming students and introducing them to the Vesos Ambassadors Club.
events.descriptionFr: Le club a lancé la nouvelle année académique avec son premier stand à l'ISIMS, accueillant les étudiants et les présentant au Club des Ambassadeurs Vesos.
events.descriptionAr: افتتح النادي السنة الجامعية الجديدة بأول جناح له في ISIMS، مرحبًا بالطلاب ومعرفًا إياهم بنادي سفراء فيزوس.
events.details: As the new semester began, the team prepared a booth to present the club's mission, values, and yearly plan. Many students stopped by to learn more and register for membership. The event served as both a recruitment day and an informal integration moment for the new generation of members joining the club for the 2023-2024 season.

events.title: Team Building Day
events.description: A team-building event was held to bring together the newly recruited members and help them connect with one another and with the club's bureau.
events.descriptionFr: Un événement de renforcement d'équipe a été organisé pour réunir les nouveaux membres recrutés et les aider à se connecter entre eux et avec le bureau du club.
events.descriptionAr: أقيمت فعالية لبناء الفريق جمعت الأعضاء الجدد وساعدتهم على التواصل مع بعضهم ومع مكتب النادي.
events.details: The session allowed both new and returning members to interact, share experiences, and build early connections within the club. Through a relaxed and friendly atmosphere, members got the chance to meet the bureau, understand its role, and feel more integrated into the group. This gathering set the tone for cooperation and collaboration throughout the season.

events.title: 1st Anniversary Celebration
events.description: The Vesos Ambassadors Club celebrated its first anniversary, bringing together members, guests, and supporters from different SOS clubs and associations.
events.descriptionFr: Le Club des Ambassadeurs Vesos a célébré son premier anniversaire, réunissant membres, invités et soutiens de différents clubs et associations SOS.
events.descriptionAr: احتفل نادي سفراء فيزوس بذكرى تأسيسه الأولى، جامعًا الأعضاء والضيوف والداعمين من مختلف أندية وجمعيات SOS.
events.details: This milestone event highlighted the club's achievements during its first year and created a space for members and visitors to celebrate the club's progress. Attendees enjoyed a warm and friendly gathering that strengthened partnerships within the SOS community. The anniversary served as a moment of appreciation, connection, and motivation for the year ahead.

events.title: VESOS Talk Show 2024
events.description: The club organized its first major public event: a talk show featuring actors, media figures, and influencers discussing the Vesos Association and its mission.
events.descriptionFr: Le club a organisé son premier grand événement public : un talk-show réunissant acteurs, personnalités médiatiques et influenceurs pour discuter de l'Association Vesos et de sa mission.
events.descriptionAr: نظم النادي أول حدث جماهيري كبير له: برنامج حواري ضم ممثلين وشخصيات إعلامية ومؤثرين للحديث عن جمعية فيزوس ورسالتها.
events.location: Palais des Congrès et Centre d'Expositions, Lac 1 - Tunis
events.locationFr: Palais des Congrès et Centre d'Expositions, Lac 1 - Tunis
events.locationAr: قصر المؤتمرات ومركز المعارض، ضفاف البحيرة 1 - تونس
events.details: This large-scale event brought together well-known personalities from different fields to highlight the objectives and social impact of the Vesos Association. Guests such as Naoufel Ouertani, Jihene Miled, Amal Knani, Mourad Ben Nefla, Fathi Mouldi, and others contributed to the conversation, helping amplify the visibility of the association. The talk show marked a significant achievement for the Vesos Ambassadors Club and expanded its reach to a wider audience.

events.title: Launch of the Vesos Ambassadors Club
events.titleFr: Lancement du Club des Ambassadeurs Vesos
events.description: Official launch of the Vesos Ambassadors Club with public stand and member recruitment.
events.descriptionFr: Lancement officiel du Club des Ambassadeurs Vesos avec un stand public et le recrutement de nouveaux membres.
events.descriptionAr: الإطلاق الرسمي لنادي سفراء فيزوس عبر جناح مفتوح للجمهور واستقطاب الأعضاء.
events.details:
The Vesos Ambassadors Club officially launched at ISIMS, marking the beginning of a new student initiative on campus. A stand was set up to introduce the club, share its vision, and welcome students interested in joining.

During this first public appearance, the team presented the club's objectives, activities, and future plans. The stand attracted many students who engaged with the team, learned about the club's mission, and signed up as new members. This milestone event laid the foundation for the club's community and the activities that followed throughout the year.

events.title: Integration Day
events.description: Welcoming new members with friendly meet-up and team interaction.
events.descriptionFr: Accueil des nouveaux membres lors d'une rencontre conviviale et d'échanges avec l'équipe.
events.descriptionAr: استقبال الأعضاء الجدد بلقاء ودي وتفاعل مع فريق النادي.
events.location: Diamond Bowling, Avenue de Carthage, Sfax
events.locationFr: Diamond Bowling, Avenue de Carthage, Sfax
events.details:
An integration day was organized to welcome the newly recruited members and help them get familiar with the club's environment and leadership team.

The session brought together new members for a friendly and engaging meet-up. Participants had the chance to introduce themselves, interact with the bureau, and learn more about the club's values and workflow. The atmosphere was relaxed and enjoyable, encouraging early connections and a sense of belonging within the team.

events.title: Team Building Day
events.description: Team-building activities focused on strengthening cooperation and group dynamics.
events.descriptionFr: Des activités de team building ont été proposées pour renforcer la coopération et la dynamique de groupe.
events.descriptionAr: أنشطة لبناء الفريق ركزت على تعزيز التعاون وديناميكيات العمل الجماعي.
events.details:
The club held a team-building event designed to strengthen cooperation, improve group dynamics, and help members connect beyond formal meetings.

The day included light activities and interactive moments aimed at developing communication, trust, and teamwork. Members spent time getting to know each other in a more relaxed setting, which helped reinforce group cohesion and motivation for the upcoming projects of the club. While similar in spirit to the integration day, this event focused more on teamwork and bonding within the existing group.

events.title: Public Speaking & Communication Training
events.titleFr: Formation en Prise de Parole Publique et Communication
events.description: Training session on public speaking and communication skills development.
events.descriptionFr: Séance de formation dédiée à la prise de parole en public et au développement des compétences de communication.
events.descriptionAr: جلسة تدريبية حول مهارات الإلقاء أمام الجمهور وتطوير مهارات التواصل.
events.location: Centre des Arts Dramatiques et Scéniques de Sfax
events.locationFr: Centre des Arts Dramatiques et Scéniques de Sfax
events.details:
A training session was held to help members improve their public speaking abilities and strengthen their communication skills.

The training introduced essential techniques for speaking confidently in front of an audience, structuring messages clearly, and maintaining effective communication. Participants learned practical tips and practiced scenarios that helped them become more comfortable expressing themselves in both formal and informal settings. The event aimed to support the personal and professional growth of the club's members.
